facts.text: In 1996, who won the MLS Cup? Answer: D.C. United
Who was the MLS Most Valuable Player in 1997? Answer: Preki
Which team won the Supporters' Shield in 1998? Answer: Los Angeles Galaxy
How many goals did Roy Lassiter score to win the Golden Boot in 1996? Answer: 27
In what year did the Kansas City Wizards win their first MLS Cup? Answer: 2000
Who was the Golden Boot winner with 26 goals in 2000? Answer: Mamadou Diallo
Which team did Los Angeles Galaxy defeat to win the MLS Cup in 2002? Answer: New England Revolution
In 2004, which player won the MLS Most Valuable Player award? Answer: Amado Guevara
How many titles had D.C. United won by the end of the 2004 season? Answer: 4
What was the record attendance in the 2018 MLS season? Answer: 21,873
Who scored 34 goals to win the Golden Boot in 2019? Answer: Carlos Vela
In what year did Toronto FC win their first MLS Cup? Answer: 2017
Which player won both the Most Valuable Player and the Golden Boot in 2018? Answer: Josef Martínez
How many goals did Chris Wondolowski score to win the Golden Boot in 2012? Answer: 27
In 2020, Columbus Crew SC won their 2nd MLS title by defeating Seattle Sounders FC.
Alejandro Pozuelo was awarded the MVP in the 2020 MLS season.
Diego Rossi was the top scorer in the 2020 MLS season with 14 goals.
New York City FC won the MLS Cup in 2021.
Carles Gil was named the MVP of the 2021 MLS season.
Valentín Castellanos was the top scorer in the 2021 MLS season with 19 goals.
Los Angeles FC won their 2nd MLS title in 2022.
Hany Mukhtar was both the MVP and top scorer of the 2022 MLS season with 23 goals.
Columbus Crew won their 3rd MLS title in 2023.
Luciano Acosta was named the MVP of the 2023 MLS season.
Denis Bouanga was the top scorer in the 2023 MLS season with 20 goals.
LA Galaxy won their 6th MLS title in 2024.
Lionel Messi was named the MVP of the 2024 MLS season.
Christian Benteke was the top scorer in the 2024 MLS season with 23 goals.
